description: Try our easy to follow Panzanella Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Panzanella,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Panzanella Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a barbecue or chargrill over medium heat. Cook capsicum, turning, for 10-15 minutes or until skin blackens and blisters. Place into a plastic bag and set aside to cool.
Brush bread with some of the oil. Chargrill for 30 seconds each side or until lightly charred. Remove bread and rub well with cut garlic clove. Tear into bite-sized pieces. Place in a bowl.

Peel the blackened capsicum and discard skin and seeds. Tear flesh into pieces and add to bowl with the bread, tomatoes, onion, olives, basil and parsley. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Toss gently to combine.
Whisk remaining oil and vinegar together. Pour over salad. Toss to combine. Serve.
